Title: The Time Has Come to Become One Again... Piccolo's Decision for Ultimate Power!
Writer: Aya Matsui, Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: Faced with an unbeatable enemy, Vegeta flies away in a solitary rage, and Piccolo seeks out Kami on a quest to increase his power by whatever means necessary!
